content.detailedDescription: I was outside watering the plants on my balcony. i looked up at the horizon and i saw 2 bright white objects, oval shaped, one of them seamed different, longer and bigger, flying in a very close formation. i observed them for a few seconds and i was thinking in the same time if i have time to get dressed, grab my camera  and try to capture them on film. the objects were moving in a fast straight pattern. i went inside, grabbed my camera, got dressed and run outside. i had to go in a three clear spot to be able to spot the objects again. i tried to capture them on film but i've stopped after a few seconds because i was loosing sight of the objects and i didn't have time to focus on them. they got pretty far in a matter of seconds. so i switch my camera of photo capture and i snapped a few pictures of the objects. they broke formation and were getting distance between them when i was able to photograph them. immediately after that they disappear. not by distance like furthering away, they just disappeared like dissolving very fast in the sky. i have the original un-cropped photos that i cant send you for analysis. i really regret that i lost time, amazed by what i was witnessing and i lost the opportunity to snap photos when the two objects were so close to me and to each other and more detail could be observed.
content.summary: 2 bright white objects, oval shaped, flying very close to each other.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was driving.  we left springfield, mo in my convertible.  i was gazing at the stars as we drove.  we were in between springfield and bolivar.  i could make out the milky way haze.  it was very clear.  i noticed a light coming from a distance, but it did not blink.  i pointed it out to my son.  i moved very slowly in one direction toward us.  not as high as a jet and not as low as a helicopter.  it passed slowly over us and then toward springfield.  i kept watching it from the front and then the back.  no blinking lights at all.  it appeared to look just like the jerusalem ufo that was seen on youtube.  as i watched it, it faded to nothing.  it didn't fade into the distance.  it just faded out shortly after passing over.  it was not a shooting star.  it moved very slowly.  

on a whim, i dropped my son off at home in bolivar and drove to the hospital to check the helicopter.  it was parked.  the only helicopter in the bolivar area.  i have seen all our local helicopters at night and they have a green and red light and other lights that blink.  this thing was a diamond shape light with bright parts extending, like a star.  it appeared somewhat like magnesium burning but did not pulsate.  it was too big to be a chinese lantern.  i've seen those as well.  we witnessed this thing on highway 13 heading north past the green county dump. out in the middle of nowhere.
content.summary: Looked just like the jerusalem ufo

content.detailedDescription: At 8:20pm my dog barked at my back door.  i was right there so stepped out to see why.  nothing in the yard, i looked up and saw a very bright starlike object travelling from nnw to sse high in sky.  it was about twice as bright as venus, and on a true course.  i watchedit untill it went  behind some trees.  silent, and steady brightness.
content.summary: Extreemly bright yellowish white starlike, app. magnatude -8, crosses the evening sky in

content.detailedDescription: My dad,friend and i where driving my friend back to his house. out the window i saw a bright redish light in the sky. i immediately said something and we stopped the car. we then noticed there were two of them moving in the same direction as one another but flying at different altitudes. we watched it for about a minute and turned the car around. we followed the lights and then they dissapeared behind a patch of trees. the weird thing was is that if they stayed the same altitude we should have seen them come out the other side of the trees but it seemed like they dissapeared into thin air. we drove around the area and saw a man looking into the sky near where we spotted the objects.
content.summary: My dad and my friend saw two fireballs in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work. exited the freeway and stopped at the light for wattles. lightly snowing, no wind, large flakes. i looked to my left and saw a giant size object. if i had to guess 1/2 mi to 1 mile in length. i noticed the tree limbs were bent under the object. you could very easily look into the rooms. they were pure white inside. lights flashing below windows. no noise at all. the light changed, i couldn't wait to get home to tell my wife. when i got there she said don't tell anyone about this, they'll think you're nuts. i didn't for a long time. i feel people should know these things are real.
content.summary: The portels were 10'ft wide. flashing lights below. no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I am a licensed pilot and very familiar with faa requirements for aircraft lights. while in my car waiting for my daughter to finish her piano lesson at her teacher's house i was talking on my cell phone with a good friend when a very bright object caught my attention. i ended my call in order to watch the mystery object. the object was traveling west by northwest at about 1000-1500 ft. and was traveling at about 150-200 mph. the object was a very bright orange, rectangular in shape with fuzzy edges, and was emitting a flickering bright yellow/orange flame from the center of the underbelly of the object. the object made no sound. i initially thought that it could be a floating lighted lantern. however, in my opinion, the object was traveling too fast to be a floating candle. the object did hold a steady course but appeared to gain altitude as it sped off in the distance to the west, northwest. the object was completely out of sight in about 10 seconds. it was much larger than any aircraft i have seen at that distance. it had none of the usual aircraft markings and had no flashing strobes, no red or green navigation lights, no landing light, and no tail light. i had a clear view of the bottom of the object as it flew practically directly overhead. it glowed a very bright orange color. i thought that the rectangular shape was extremely unusual and have never before seen an object of this shape flying in the sky. i was in awe of this unusual object and got out of my car to watch it.
content.summary: Bright orange ufo heading west, northwest over upper bucks co, pennsylvania. object was large and rectangular in shape and emitted a bright a bright orange flame frame the underbelly.

content.detailedDescription: I was awaken by my son at approximately 11:30 pm on 8/30/11. he said there were a lot of strange lights in the sky... my wife went outside with him and i grabbed my binoculars and joined them on the front porch. my son pointed the lights out to me and i looked up then looked through the binoculars. i was surprised to see the amount of lights all in the same general area. the sky was clear. they appeared to me to be military aircraft, since i was always told that the military aircraft flew much higher than the civilian aircraft. i noticed that there were two bright white lights set side by side similar to an automobile. the lights were both blinking off and on at the same time. i have never noticed any aircraft doing this before. i noticed that the pair of lights were followed by what appeared to be a typical aircraft. my son pointed out to me that there more at another location. i looked in that direction then looked through the binoculars and noticed the same type of lights blinking off and on as the first set. this second set of lights was also being followed by what appeared to be a typical aircraft. we watched these lights for approximately 5-7 minutes until they went out of view due to the tree lines. there were also a few aircraft flying in other directions. this area is a normal flight path for civilian airlines; but what we saw definitely was not a civilian aircraft.
content.summary: 2 bright white lights side by side blinking on and off at the same time being followed by aircraft

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i witnessed a white light flying over us while in our driveway.Without blinking out any other lights flew in a curved direction and disappeared into the clouds.
content.summary: A stationary white light that flew in a small curve.No craft visible and disappeared in clouds

content.detailedDescription: The object was heading se over the 11203 area code. it could be a plane but for how bright the light was it should have been close enough to emit engine noise. a plane flew near the same area and it's foward light was dimmer and the plane was further and i heard it engine noise slightly. also to note the light was steady with no flashing red/green lights. just wanted to post just in case someone saw the same thing.
content.summary: Very bright star like object

content.detailedDescription:
This afternoon i was taking the scenic route home and noticed a light pinkish-salmon colored cigar-shaped ufo in the sky.  the weather was hot, humid, and hazy.  as i was driving on star valley road, northeast of hollandale, wisconsin, about a quarter mile before the junction with county road f, i noticed something flying left to right in my line of sight and thought 'small plane'.  the object was about the size of a small jet, but an odd color for a jet or plane.  within a couple of seconds i also realized that the object had no wings, no tail, no windows, and had 'soft', indistinct edges.  the sky was a light grayish-blue with no clouds, and the color of the object made it blend in with the sky, unlike a plane or helicopter.  the object looked like a jet fuselage with no markings, windows, wings, or tail.  there were no contrails.  i don't know if there was any noise, as i had the windows rolled up and the air conditioning on.

the object seemed to move a bit faster than a small plane.  after observing it for about 6 or 7 seconds, it disappeared, as if it became invisible.  i had a clear, unobstructed view - the object didn't go behind a cloud, treeline, etc.

when i reached the intersection of star valley road and county road f i stopped for several seconds and scanned the entire area.  i was able to see for 2-3 miles in all directions, and the object was nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: Light pink cigar-shaped ufo seen in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription:
this has bugged for over a year now and i find myself constantly looking for this object again in the sky.  i finally decided i need to share this cause i haven't a clue what this was but that maybe others saw it as well and have reported it.  at first i didn't want to report it but it's really bugging me now.  this actually happened to me in march of 2010.  
   but i was heading to work early in the morning, i had to open.  so i left about a quarter to 5 when i opened cause i was working in schererville, in at the time.  takes a bit of time to get there.  it was also early to mid march at the time too.  it was a beautiful clear early spring morning.
   well i live with a cousin right now and his home faces north.  it's a duplex and his front door faces east.  well i left the house and locked the door behind me.  to get to my car i have to walk to the north down the sidewalk to the driveway where i park my car.  when i came around the corner of the house this light caught my eye.  i literally stood there transfixed because i've never seen anything like this before.
   the object/light was to the northwest and it was heading in a northwestern direction.  it caught my eye because it was a large strobing light in the center with 2 smaller non-strobing lights above and below the larger central strobing light.  all 3 lights were also white.  there was no color changing or anything, just plain white.  the central strobing light was in a set rythem too.  i was a steady 3-5 seconds between the strobing.  so i stood there watching these lights maybe 5 minutes or so till they got behind some trees and then i hopped in my car and shot out to route 6 to see it again.  when i first saw them, they had to be 5-10 miles away and over lockport from my best guess.  by the time i got the car started and got out to route 6 which is a couple blocks, this thing had to be maybe 30 miles away by my guess.  i never heard any sound.  and it was a clear early spring day, there were no clouds so you could see forever it seemed.  i sat there watching the lights again till they went behind another set of trees and i never saw it again.
   i haven't a clue what it was.  i've seen planes and blimps mt entire life.  i go out and see meteor showers when it's clear and always look at the stars, planets and constellations.  i've been teaching my nephews and niece about these things.  this object was none of them.  planes don't fly with the wings above and below and they don't have strobing lights in the middle.  planes also don't have just white lights like this thing had.  i never saw any structure because of the distance so all i saw was the lights.  blimps also don't have large central strobing lights either as far as i know.  and i know this wasn't a star, planet or a meteor.  your guess is as good as mine as to what this was.
   as for my feelings about what i saw.  liked i said at the time, i was transfixed.  i didn't want to lose sight of it because of how unusual this was.  so i just stood in the driveway watching it.  when i got to route 6 in my car and spotted it again, i sat there watching it again till i lost sight of it a second time.  i don't own a cell phone because i hate the things but this was the one time i wish i actually had one.  and i didn't go inside to wake my cousin because i didn't want to lose sight of this thing.  the only feeling i've had since is that i want to know what this thing was and that i hope i get to see it again.  every morning or night that i'm outside now, i look in the sky for it.  i want to see it again.  i also haven't really talked about it to but a few people i know cause i don't want anyone to think i'm crazy.  i know i'm not.  i just want an answer to what it was.  i'm not even saying it was aliens either.  but this was something unique and not sure who or what was flying it.
content.summary: Unknown large strobing central light in sky with 2 small solid lights above and below

content.detailedDescription: It appeared from nowhere very close to a constant bright star at the rear of property, at first vastly brighter than star which is why i think i noticed it out of the window in my living room but quickly faded away to nothing. it was star like in colour and glow but much brighter before it started to fade, it was over in about 15 to 20 seconds and the objet was moving at aeroplane speed in a diagonal line upward not down.
content.summary: Star like object travelling past a star and fading away quickly

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i had gone out camping, we had a a fire going and a were laying bag looking at the stars. we saw a few meteors and quite a few constellations. then out of nowhere a large amount of the stars started moving! we were examining them and noticed that they were definitely were not shooting stars. they were moving in several different directions, turning around, zig-zagging, and moving up and down, all of which a man-made craft could never accomplish in the present or even near future. then we witnessed a brighter lit craft blinking in accordance with a dimmer one which seemed farther out. then out of nowhere a faster moving craft with blinking white, red, and blue lights that were blinking rapidly changing between those colors came across the sky then halted when it came to the brighter craft i have mentioned earlier for a brief moment. then it continued onward ducking behind the tree line not to be seen again. we kept watching for about another 45 mins to an hour. then about 50 yards from us was a huge unmistakable noise. it sounded like a jetliner on the ground after a long flight, but then it within a split second was completely silent. then upon listening further we heard it again, this happened one more time as we were trying to figure out what it was as this is a setting where we are out in the boonies with nothing like that around. upon the last jetliner like noise we then felt a heavy aura and feeling of fear, as if there was something big pouring its essence our way. then we heard the farmer's dogs across the way behind the tree line barking as though they sensed something bad, and almost immediately we heard a somewhat mimicking noise as though the aliens were trying to mimic the the dogs but we could tell it wasn't the dogs because it was a little different, with a lot more echo to the sound. at this point we decided it was probably a good idea to douse the fire, pack up all our gear (i say pack up but i mean we literally just threw it all in the back seat of my friends car), then my friend said "if i don't go look i'm going to regret it." so after the gear was in the car i was waiting for him to come back, i got impatient with waiting fearing what could be and went to go find him. i caught him as he was walking back in a rather fast pace as he seemed freaked out as we both were. then i told him to hop in the passenger seat and we left slowly trying not to make any excess noise. at this point my friend had his phone out recording just in case something else were to happen so we could capture it in video. nothing else happened unfortunately and i know no one will believe us but we saw what we saw and heard what we heard and there is no doubt in my mind that aliens do in-fact exist. thanks for reading my story and if you have any questions feel free to email me at (e-mail address removed) cms 09/01/11 21:46 cst
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watching stars move different directions then heard jet liner around 50 yards out

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard on the stone seating area. i am usually at the fire pit with the telescope watching the planet and stars when this occurred. this object was just there out of no where
a very bright white-blue light first traveling from west to east. it then made a sudden direction change to the south. after a short distance made a 90 degree turn back to the east. it then flew a short distance east and the light went from a white-blue to a small orange and out of sight. this thing was amazing. i first thought it was the iss but it was too early for that sighting and there were too many clouds. this thing was under the cloud ceiling. i will never forget what i saw and the direction changes it made
content.summary: Intense white-blue object that made sudden directional changes

content.detailedDescription: Standing on porch in rockbridge county, va, clear night. enjoying night sky with a group of four (4) friends. looking into the sky, say what appeared to be a satellite appear over treeline in the horizon. after realizing that first craft was probably a satellite, due to flashing lights combined with increasing altitude and accelerating with tremendous velocity. however, after the satellite left, a large, white, spheroid appeared in the opposite side of the sky. the object was a solid white with a smoky gray core, lights did not flicker and remained constant. the ufo ascended, took a series of 8 45 degree turns, first to my right, then left, alternating in that fashion. after that, it went across the sky, hovered directly overhead at an altitude of approximately 2500ft, then took off, to my right. the lights changed from white to reddish-orange, then to a dark red before completely vanishing from sight from all of my party. note that in the airspace in which the ufo became impossible to see, the sky was exceptionally  clear and also it did not "hide" behind cloud cover, or any sort of terrestrial interference. a short period of time later, approximately 2 and a half minutes, a total of 14 aircraft entered into my field of view, from many different directions, seemingly analyzing the domain. however, the red light reappeared, with no signs of its origin, changed to white once again, and started towards the point in the sky marked by the milky way. a jet changed course and seemed as if trying to intercept the craft. the ufo descended, slowed, then quickly darted towards the jet. after a very close encounter between the two objects, the jet preformed a 180 degree turned and went back to where it came from, as well as did at least 3 other aircraft in the area. the ufo then moved in a spiral, gaining approximately 1/16th of its original radius per revolution, clockwise, for a full 4 turns, then once again, changed color; however, this time it darkened, and faded into the darkness of the sky.
content.summary: 8 45 degree turns, extraordinary speed, color changes, and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw brightly lit object to south west moving to north east.  as it got closer it slowed.  object was large, egg shaped and brightly lit.  (2) f-15 jets were pursuing the object and all were moving at a slow rate of speed approx. 750 ft above ground.  second object came from south west then as it reached about 1 mile it rose slightly, rolled left at 90 deg. then flew out of sight on knife edge.  with in 30 seconds after 2nd object flew out of sight a meteor streaked from 11 oclock to 8 oclock due north of my location.

first object was larger than a c-5 galaxy and was completely silent. second object was silent except for the sounf of air/wind.  this object was the size of an f-111 but shaped total different.  the first object was moving in a stuttered motion not completely fluid.

whole event took place less than a half mile radius of my location.
content.summary: Object flew over silently being pursued by (2) f-15, they were being foloowed by 2nd object.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my pool on a clear night when i noticed 3 lights in a triangle formation hovering south-west of nashville. i watched them for a period of 45 minutes hovering at times. at the time it was hovering there was another small ufo flying back from one light of the boomerang to the opposite light with extreme, maneuvering. i thought that it could be planes, but after i noticed the size, way over 300ft this could not be planes moving in the same speed and direction. the lights were at the tip and at the ends of it. the lights were pulsating from rose colored to red to pink. the smaller ufo was leaving a slight blue and red trail behind it (like a shooting star), and moved from one wing tip to the other with great speed and maneuverability. i searched the sky the following nights to make sure that this was not a star constellation and the 3 lights were not there. the object moved slowly in the south-west direction.
content.summary: Boomerang ufo with small ufo's near it

content.detailedDescription: Went for a walk tonight (august 31, 2011) and saw a bright red light moving slowly through the sky in a straight line no more than 500 feet altitude and no more than a half mile away. it was traveling north initially. it moved approximately a quarter mile after my initial sighting and as it approach me i could see there was a disk-shaped side to it. it then turned 90 degrees in a disciplined fashion and continued on for a short distance and changed another 90 degrees and then it wasn't visible since the light beam was now behind the craft and it wasn't seen again. during the same evening i observed approximately 6 - 7 star-like color shifting objects in the sky. these were all distributed fairly evenly in a circle about the size of 100 square miles. these are stationary and flicker blue, red, green, white purple etc. these do not move and are not geosynchronous. they are easily discernible from surrounding stars and a visible planet this night.
content.summary: Walking at night and saw a bright deep red beam (crystal shaped) on side of low flying craft.

content.detailedDescription: I live in a very dark area just outside of joshua tree national park. i was having my evening cigarette in front of my house while gazing at the stars as usual. i've seen what i've assumed were satellites before, a solid light tracking across the sky from one end of the horizon to the other.  tonight i saw what at first seemed to be an airplane because of how low on the horizon it was, but i didn't see any blinking lights. it was in the north sky traveling east to west about 25 degrees over the horizon. then i thought it may be a satellite, but it was moving really fast and smooth. it moved behind a tree so i figured i'd keep an eye on it until it came out the other side. i saw the lights twinkling through the tree as it was making its way past, but it never came out the other side, so i stepped out into the street and i saw it going the opposite direction back behind the tree.  so i waited for it to come out the other side. it never did. then i looked up to about 50 degrees and there was a stationary orangeish light. it then slowly rose a couple of degrees, blinked 3 times and then it was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I thought it might have been a satellite at first but then it changed directions

content.detailedDescription:
I had just went downstairs to check something that i had cooking on the grill.  being an avid sky watcher, i turned and scanned the sky.  i then noticed an extremely bright light coming out of the west.  i at first thought that it was a helicopter with a bright search light on.  it was then that i noticed that what ever it was it was completely silent.  after a few seconds i realized that it was a ufo, so i called for my wife to come out on the upstairs deck and look at it.  she came out on the deck and saw it, upon which time i asked her to run in my office and get my camcorder.  she brought it down to me and brought her camera too.  we both then tried to get pictures of it as it flew overhead and in an easterly direction.  suddenly it dimmed down to about as bright as a bright star.  shortly i lost sight of it, but my wife went around to the front of the house with a pair of binoculars.  she then yelled to me that it was returning but at a much higher altitude.  by the time i realized what she was saying, it had apparently gained altitude and disappeared.

i have seen lights moving in the sky, both in the day  and at night before, but never have i seen one that close.  i'm used to seeing both planes and helicopters fly over my property so i can definately say that this was neither.  it was too slow to be a meteor, and too fast to be a satelite.
content.summary: Very bright light first noticed at about 80 degrees.  it continued to fly directly overhead and passed me.

content.detailedDescription:
Was walking home down broadway street between 1:30-2am on the night of august 30 in providence, rhode island.  admiring the stars, i noticed an unusual 'line' of bright white vertical lights at about 55 degrees and very far away in the distance (star distance).  the lights caught my eye because they were perfectly vertical,and very close together, making a straight pulsating line of subtle color changes (very faint however, not obvious at first glance) like how a radio or cell tower might look if it were up in space.  this was not a cell tower. when i got home i stood on my balcony transfixed by the lights.  the crazy thing happened when i turned my head laterally.  if you hold your finger out in front of your face vertically (and keep it like that) and tilt your head from left to right, the perspective of the finger remains the same, it doesn't move, stays vertical.  these lights, however, would turn with my head.  for example, hold your finger in front of you, tilt your head to the left and also tilt your finger to the left, tilt to the right and tilt the finger to match.  it was if the light were connected to my vision somehow, whereby altering my angle of perception altered the vertical nature of the lights.  lying down would cause the lights to match the angle of my horizontal viewing perspective.  the lights were there for over an hour, but finally i got bored and went to bed, so they might have been there longer.  not sure what could account for this but i'll look out tonight when i get home and see if i see them again.  i gave a psychic wink to the et's if it's them so maybe i'll have a abduction story before long.  hope not, unless it's fun.  probably too dark for a photo but will try if the lights are back tonight.

thanks!
content.summary: Vertical line of lights high in the sky above providence, rhode island

content.detailedDescription: I was attending the drag races at cordova ill. i happened to look up and directly overhead i observed a orange/red small circular light that would pulse to a bigger round orange light.  i watched it move at a speed i would compare to a slow moving helicopter.  i kept trying to find other identifying lights, but saw none. it traveled south with a continuous pulse, turned slightly to the west and then south again. not much farther it pulsed bright and disappeared. i pointed it out to person by me and they just said ufo.  i did make an attempt at a photo and wasn't going to report until i saw the ill video posted for aug 17.  it looked similar to what i observed. i included the picture as taken, not zoomed or enhanced.  its just a small orange dot, but you can zoom in on it.
content.summary: Orange/red small circular light would pulse to bigger round orange light

content.detailedDescription: Last night in new york (aug 30th) around 10pm i noticed from the apartment windows overlooking the hudson looking out across to jersey city from lower manhattan a hovering, stationary-seeming airborne object over jersey city. it had a bright red light flashing regularly underneath. i enjoy aviation and frequently look out of the apartment windows to see what's what. i knew this wasn't a plane from first glance. i looked at it long and hard because it had an odd bulk to its shape. it seemed too big for a helicopter, and probably therefore was a blimp. my feeling was that it was unidentifiable by the naked eye. it made me pretty inquisitive to know what it was. i watched it hardly moving, maybe progressing but very slow. logic told me it had to be a helicopter, so i got on with other stuff. but when after 10 minutes i saw it was still there and had not changed position much, i decided to photograph it. these pictures were taken with an 8 second exposure. i zoomed one using iphoto. the object is not something i recognise. it is probably some sort of balloon/blimp. but it would be interesting to know what type, and what it was doing. it continued slowly, progressing inland away from jersey city for about an hour, the flashing red light very prominent and visible. my friends' kids came in not long after i had photographed it and i pointed out the object to them. it must have been seen by thousands. i am sure there is a sensible explanation.
content.summary: Object slowly moved at height from over jersey city into new jersey

content.detailedDescription: I was out on the back porch and was looking at the night sky as i had seen a shooting star prior to the sighting. my porch stands roughly 8 feet off the ground and i have a fairly clear view of the stars considering the street lights in the neighborhood. roughly five minutes after i saw the shooting star an object flying overhead passed my field of view and was traveling in a straight trajectory approaching from nnw and heading sse toward dishman hills. as i was looking at the object i was trying to process what i was seeing, as i could make out the fact that it was solid, but it appeared opaque in color (almost camouflage). i knew what i was seeing was not an airplane, helicopter, balloon, kite, plastic bag, helicopter or bird. i was somewhat mesmerized and rubbed my eyes to try to get a clearer view as i knew what i was seeing was very strange. it had the solid outline of an oval object but it was difficult to make out any other details. a commercial airplane was visible overhead at probably 20 thousand feet (i could see the blinking lights) the object was very close (relatively speaking)and well below the cloud line - but not close enough that i felt alarmed. there were no lights whatsoever and no sound. the object blocked the background but gave off no reflection of the surrounding environment. instead it appeared somewhat milky and wavy colored (very dimly pulsating?) i got the feeling whatever it was was trying not to be seen - as odd as that sounds. i knew that had i not just happened to look in that exact spot as it crossed my field of view i would have never noticed it. i wanted to rush inside and grab my camera but given the objects speed (50 mph? at a distance of 500-1000 feet?), lack of lights and the darkness, i knew it would soon disappear from my view. i watched as it continued along its flight path in a completely straight line towards the hills. the object made two seemingly impossible flight maneuvers where it shot straight up and then back down to the left as it was passing over centennial middle school and then disappeared out of sight. the whole sighting was 10-15 seconds. i was not scared before, during or after the sighting. i was more just trying to analyze what i was seeing. it was very weird and i have never seen anything like it before or since! i stayed outside scanning the sky where i had last seen the object hoping to see it again (i really want to know what it was). i remained outside for about 15 minutes looking - but never saw it again.
content.summary: Noticed a strange object in the night sky that appeared almost opaque in color (whitish-gray)

content.detailedDescription: At around 2 am sunday morning, august 28th, my friend and i were in my front yard talking when the area around us lit up. i looked up almost immediately and saw a very bright circular light just above the tree tops of the hill directly in front of, but across the road from, my house. the light resembled a hula-hoop stood on its end and was very bright. the center was dark, and it happened so quickly that i could not tell if it was just a circle of light or if the light was actually on the rim of an object, but i was able to clearly see that the light was solid. probably lasted 30-45 seconds, and then quickly just sort of went out. i have searched online to see if any other people had reported seeing the light, but so far i haven't turned anything up.
content.summary: Very bright circular light just above tree tops

content.detailedDescription: My wife was returning from her nightly walk, when she noticed the first anomoly. she called me on her cell phone and told me to go look out the front door,which faces east. she told me to look in the sky above the neighbors house across the street to the east and tell me what i thought was in the sky. as i stepped outside i didn'tnotice it at first, but as it was taking a tract from southeast to northwest, it appeared above the tree a very reddiish-orange,what appeared to be triangular shape made a slow,around 30 second path, which ended by it disappearing about the time it reached the tipp of the cup of the big dipper. when it reached the apogee of its flight, the second ,greenish white object intersected its flight path travling in the other direction. being the first had just disappeared, we followed the second to low on the eastern horizon, when the wife said there the other one is again! it seemed to take the same tract as it did the first time, disappearing once again at the point of the cup of the big dipper in the western sky. got to go to work in the morning or i'd stay up all night sky watching!  sorry i didn't have my camera. never have witnessed anything quite like it. amazing!
content.summary: At8:20 pm two objects were seen by my wife,my neighbors, and myself. one orange, one greenish. they were traveling in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: We are the same family that reported the objects seen moving throughout the sky in the evenings. this is the 3rd time an object like this has flown directly over our house. this time we were able to grab our video camera. this thing was huge and relatively quite. it made a sound that was almost mechanical, not sure how else to describe it. you could see windows in the craft, but unable to see what was flying it if anything. i flashed a flashlight at it a couple of times, but nothing happened. this is not the same thing we see on a nightly basis outside, this object seems to becoming a weekly thing. is anyone else seeing these things? we have 3 witnesses and video. maybe the video can be enhanced, it was recorded in 720p hd.
content.summary: Maine family has craft fly above house again

content.detailedDescription:
I did not witness this but am reporting what a family friend saw. i received the pictures and interviewed the friend in great detail to put the report together.

our friend, about 15 minutes after experiencing the minor earthquake, went outside to look around and observed a black diamond shaped object hovering or moving very slowly in the sky. curious as to what the object was, the friend took a couple of pictures with a cell phone.

our friend isn't a great judge of distance, but believed the object was large and very high, probably at cloud level. it was a relatively clear day with high occasional clouds.

the object made no sound or smoke.

i asked if it could have been a stealth fighter or bomber and the fried said it wasn't and that they had seen those before and this wasn't it.

i asked if the object could have been a balloon, rc plane, debris or a hoax of some kind and our friend said there was no way it was that.

i then asked why there weren't more pictures if it was hovering or moving so slowly and there actually is a 3rd picture that i didn't receive yet.  

i also asked how did it leave the area or go out of view and it actually changed direction and ascended abruptly out of sight. it moved much faster than any plane or jet they ever saw.

the oject moved from east to west and i believe took off up. in pic1 it is farther, in pic2 it is closer and the sequence confirms the direction of travel.

our friend isn't shook up or affected in any way, but incredibly puzzled by what they saw.  anyone else see something like this in the area?  does it have something to do with the quake?  is it the x37b?

can somebody look at these pics to see if they were altered? i can't see any signs of it when i zoom in to the pixel range.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Within 15 minutes of earthquake spotted black diamond shaped object over northern part of city.

content.detailedDescription: Three people seen ship land in back yard alien got out started chasing cows an horses an seen we were watching them stand there lookingat us for a while got back in ship an took off after that we seen it several times    herd wei rtrd noises in bushes i have pictures
content.summary: Shining all lite up very big

content.detailedDescription: That day on june 23, 2007 i was headed to school heading north on foot i made a right hand turn on the corner of 7th and normandie and i saw this thing above a building spinning like a wobbly top, you know when the top is loosing its momentum and it starts to wobble; luckily that day i had my digital camera, i was taking art at the time at the local college which is why i had the camera that day, i only had a few seconds to react to pull the camera from my backpack, turning it on and snapping the two pictures by the time i had done that the object was gone. i've seen unconventional objects before but this was the first time i had a camera and i felt lucky to have captured it on digital film. the camera model is a canon powershot a95 5mp. the pictures don't do the object justice of what i saw that day especially the spinning movement characteristics of the object that i witness that day. afterwards i took a look at the pictures on the first image it looks like a black sphere, on the second it looks like the object is going, for lack of better word, invisible. looks like when i snapped the second image i captured the object turning invisible. i added arrows to indicate the location of the object on the pictures and cropped one of the pictures.
content.summary: Red and black orb spinning like a top
